name: VSE Corporation
description: VSE Corporation is a diversified, publicly traded company that provides innovative solutions in the automotive, aerospace, and defense industries. Founded in 1959, VSE has a rich history of delivering high-quality products and services to its clients. The company operates through various segments, including VSE Automotive, which focuses on providing parts and services to government and commercial customers; VSE Aviation, which specializes in aircraft maintenance, repair, and overhaul (MRO) services; and VSE Federal Services, which supports government contracts and provides logistics and support solutions. VSE is committed to excellence and customer satisfaction, leveraging its expertise to meet the evolving needs of modern industries. The company prides itself on its ability to adapt to changing market dynamics, investing in technology and capabilities that enhance operational efficiency and customer service. VSE’s mission is to support its customers with reliable and innovative solutions while maintaining a strong commitment to ethical practices and community engagement. By fostering a culture of continuous improvement and embracing challenges, VSE aims to be a trusted partner in the sectors it serves.
ceo: John M. W. M. F. B. C. A. F. O. F. N. R.

key_executives.name: John M. W. M. F. B. C. A. F. O. F. N. R.

seo.meta_title: VSE Corporation | Innovative Solutions in Automotive, Aerospace, and Defense
seo.meta_description: Explore VSE Corporation, a leader in providing innovative automotive, aerospace, and defense solutions. Learn about VSE's extensive services and commitment to excellence.

faq.question: What does VSE Corporation do?
faq.answer: VSE Corporation provides solutions in the automotive, aerospace, and defense industries, focusing on parts supply, MRO services, and logistics support.

faq.question: Where is VSE Corporation headquartered?
faq.answer: VSE Corporation is headquartered in Alexandria, Virginia, USA.
